narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Restorative Health Services LLC is a Technician, Personal Care Attendant provider based in Corpus Christi, TX. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $56.8M in Medicaid payments across 1.1M claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $56.8M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
